scripts.precy:open:dev: lerna exec --scope @{{organization}}/{{dashCase name}} gatsby develop & wait-on http://localhost:8000
scripts.precy:open:prod: GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=development npm run build && NODE_ENV=development GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=development lerna exec --scope @{{organization}}/{{dashCase name}} npm run serve & wait-on http://localhost:5000
scripts.test:e2e: lerna exec --scope @{{organization}}/{{dashCase name}} npm run build && lerna exec --scope @{{organization}}/{{dashCase name}} npm run serve & wait-on http://localhost:5000 && NODE_ENV=local CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5000 cypress run --headless
scripts.test:ci: wait-on http://localhost:5000 && NODE_ENV=local CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5000 cypress run --headless
